# Past Android Gradle plugin releases

The pages in the table of contents list the features and improvements for past major releases of the Android Gradle plugin. To see what's new in the latest version, see the current[Android Gradle plugin release notes](https://developer.android.com/studio/releases/gradle-plugin).

For the latest news on releases, including a list of notable fixes in each preview release, see the[release updates](https://androidstudio.googleblog.com/).
